servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P2119: Throttle Actuator Control System – Stuck Open

entry.ptxt: Difference between targeted TP and measured TP is more than specified value.

attention3.ptxt: If DTC other than aimed DTC are previously detected in DTC confirmation procedure, be sure to troubleshoot DTC previously detected.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Run engine at idle speed for 20 sec.
Run engine at 3,000 rpm for 20 sec.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:J24B .

testgroup.title: DTC check
testgroup.question: Is there DTC(s) other than P2119?

testgroup.title: Throttle motor power supply circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch and disconnect connectors from ECM.
Check for proper terminal connection to ECM connectors.
If connections are OK, turn ignition switch to ON position.
Check that throttle motor power supply circuit (A4) is battery voltage.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

test1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch and disconnect connector from throttle body assembly.
Check for proper terminal connection to throttle body assembly connector.
If connection is OK, check that throttle motor drive circuit (open and close) (B1 – B2) is as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of each throttle motor drive circuit is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance of each throttle motor drive circuit is infinity between throttle body assembly connector and vehicle body ground.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between each throttle motor drive circuit terminal and other terminals at throttle body assembly connector.
Circuit voltage of each throttle motor drive circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch in ON position.

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

test1.ptxt: Check that TP sensor (main) signal circuit (C2) is as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of TP sensor (main) signal circuit is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance of TP sensor (main) signal circuit is infinity between throttle body assembly connector and vehicle body ground.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between TP sensor (main) signal circuit and each terminal at throttle body assembly connector.
Circuit voltage of TP sensor (main) signal circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch in ON position.

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

test1.ptxt: Check throttle body for operation and condition.

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
